resources.string: Where do I get images to trace?
You can get images from your device gallery or from Bing Images. Whenever you get an image you have the option of saving it to Trace to use again.
How do I edit my image before tracing?
After choosing an image, you can resize it on the camera screen.
Yes. After adding your first image, tap the + icon on the edit screen.
How do I remove an image?
On the edit screen, drag the image to the trash icon.
What types of images can I use?
